titleInfo.title: Food City 500 at the Bristol Motor Speedway

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, black, and blue on white) announcing Food City 500, an annual 500-lap, 266.5-mile (428.9 km) Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series points race held at the Bristol Motor Speedway. Poster features woodcuts of checkered flags and Bristol trophy.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
